ai-tha-ap155:0.3_0: (She needed) to lay down on the ground and he gave (them).
ai-tha-ap155:1.1_0: A person who slays their mother
ai-tha-ap155:1.2_0: I was drunken on the rainy season.
ai-tha-ap155:1.3_0: like the moon on the fifteenth day.
ai-tha-ap155:1.4_0: which leads out to the world,
ai-tha-ap155:2.2_0: they all had ended the defilements.
ai-tha-ap155:3.2_0: emancipating, it leads to the world.
ai-tha-ap155:3.3_0: he danced it there, and therein the yellow cloth,
ai-tha-ap155:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap155:4.4_0: the fruit here is the lump of wealth.
ai-tha-ap155:5.1_0: have been set out from here.
ai-tha-ap155:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Ujjenī.
ai-tha-ap155:8.1_0: (Tissa answered) the third Elder Nuns’ lady,
